replies.bodyText: They don't work anymore because I changed it, and I think it should be like this: The exported flag should only be set when exported to DMS, but not if an export to the home directory is carried out. The flag should not be set when exporting to the home directory, isn’t it? That's why I removed the tests for it, too.
replies.author: matthias-ronge

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason to save the process, when the process flagis not changed again? I think this save is only neccessary when export failed and exportflag changed back. It is indeed only neccessary if the flag ACTUALLY changed. This also counts for first save. So if the process is already exported, no save is needed at all
timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber

timeline.bodyText: DAOException and IOExceotion are never thrown in this method. So if you are already changing the signatur, remove not needed exceptions.
timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber

timeline.message:
Export link to this process the first time you export

Fixes #3623, fixes #3625, fixes #3633
Save process status in export; don’t set 'exported' on METS-only write
Only save the export status if there is an actual change
Not declare exceptions that only the superclass throws
Remove catching exceptions that are not thrown
Remove catching exceptions that are not thrown
